name: hotdog-boyz-discord-app
description: A Discord bot for the HOTDOG BOY Z channel
author: Eric Stout <ericwstout@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn test && parcel build ./src/src/index.ts --target node --detailed-report 10 --log-level 3 --no-source-maps --no-cache --out-dir dist/
scripts.test: yarn format:check && yarn lint && yarn types:check
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn version && git push && git push --tags
